channel.title: Comments on: One Year Anniversary
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Daniel
item.dc:creator: Daniel
item.content:encoded:
“My post of this summer on ‘Rav Kook and Other Religions and Revelation’ should have gotten readers but it received no hits.”

I don’t know — I have the quotations from LeNevuchei HaZeman pasted into my R’AIK text file, so where else could I have found them?

Todah Rabbah for the blog, and an easy and productive fast.

item.title: By: Zach
item.dc:creator: Zach
item.description: Yasher Koach on all of your hard work. I really appreciate having a blog that I can go to where I can continuously have my perspective broadened.
item.content:encoded: Yasher Koach on all of your hard work. I really appreciate having a blog that I can go to where I can continuously have my perspective broadened.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2010/09/11/one-year-anniversary/#comment-1596">Itzchak</a>.
Itzhak, you have already posted your article twice before on this blog. I caught it the first time. No more, OK. Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Itzchak.

Itzhak, you have already posted your article twice before on this blog. I caught it the first time. No more, OK. Thanks.

item.title: By: Itzchak
item.dc:creator: Itzchak
item.description:
i read the one on Rav Kook and other religions.... If you're interested in Rav Kook this may be of interest to you It's from this summer's Tikkun magazine.
http://www.tikkun.org/article.php?story=july2010marmorstein
item.content:encoded:

It’s from this summer’s Tikkun magazine.

item.title: By: Pierre
item.dc:creator: Pierre
item.description: Happy Birthday and thank you for blogging!
item.content:encoded: Happy Birthday and thank you for blogging!
